title: lettre-digital-tutorial
text: This is a tutorial website of lettre-digital-carnets for Opera-Bernoulli-Euler.

title: lettre-digital-tutorial
text: This is a notebook for the Quarto project. Quarto is a new document format that allows you to write documents in markdown and have them rendered to a variety of formats including HTML, PDF, Word, and more. Quarto is built on top of Pandoc and is designed to be a superset of Pandoc markdown. Quarto is also designed to be a superset of R Markdown, so you can use all of the features of R Markdown in Quarto documents.

title: lettre-digital-tutorial
text:
Editions like Euler Opera Omnia and Bernoulli Opera Omnia are a great source of information and scholarly reference. They are also a great source of scholarly inquiry. New findings can be published with traditional publication channels like book or articles. Novel media are Euler Opera Omnia Serie Quinta: Contributions. There core format are

quarto notebooks in markdown format
computational notebooks in Jupyter format
observablehq notebooks

The notebooks are published in the Euler Opera Omnia Serie Quinta: Contributions after a fast peer review process. The notebooks are published under a CC-BY-SA license. The notebooks are published in the Euler Opera Omnia Serie Quinta: Contributions after a fast peer review process. The notebooks are published under a CC-BY-SA license.
